channel.title: Jonathan Majors on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kevin Spacey Dedicates Lifetime Achievement Award to Val Kilmer; Jonathan Majors and Meagan Good Also Honored at Amsterdam Black-Tie Gala
item.description: “In 2017, when a number of people were walking away from me, Val was busy coming toward me, sending love and his support, and I will never forget him for that,” Spacey said in accepting the honor.

item.title: Kevin Spacey Dedicates Lifetime Achievement Award to Val Kilmer; Jonathan Majors and Meagan Good Also Honored at Amsterdam Black-Tie Gala
item.description: “In 2017, when a number of people were walking away from me, Val was busy coming toward me, sending love and his support, and I will never forget him for that,” Spacey said in accepting the honor.
